text:
起きて？ …ん？ なに？
あぁ、またあのエッチな夢だ。 すごいな、2回も明晰夢見るなんて珍しい。 しかも同じ夢だ。
先程半分覚醒したみたいな頭が作り出した夢にもう一度浮上して、乙骨の目の前にまた腰に跨る彼女が映し出される。
さっきよりもさらに扇情的で、涙に濡れて眉根を寄せた表情が淫靡だ。
もっと気持ち良くなって欲しい。
trans:
Wake up? ...Hmm? What is it?
Ah, it is that erotic dream again. Wow having a lucid dream twice is rare. And it is the same dream.
As his semi-conscious mind crafted another dream, Okotsu found himself back in the same scene, with her straddling his waist once again.
Her expression was even more alluring than before - sensual, with tears glistening in her eyes and her brows knit together.
I want to make her feel even better.
